title: Customer Relationship Management System
description: Led a team to build a CRM system with Java (backend) and React.js (frontend), applying Agile methodology.
Implemented CRUD, authentication, and password reset using OOP and UML design.
Integrated relational databases and resolved technical challenges, strengthening problem-solving and collaboration skills.

title: Travel Website
description: Developed a responsive travel booking website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap.
Solved integration issues, improving workflow and reducing merge conflicts by 30%.
Used Git version control and code reviews to support teamwork and collaboration.

title: Warehouse Management System
description: Backend development Implement a system using Java.
Used UML class diagrams and object-oriented programming concepts to create a good program design that facilitates coding.
Implement the Person Module method including CRUD, login, logout, and reset password.
Conducted source code reviews, and maintained Git pipelines and repositories to GitHub

title: Train Ticketing System
description: Backend development, built a system using C language.
Combined the other three module codes developed by team members.
Used flow chat and structure chat to have a good program design to facilitate coding.
Implemented staff Module functionalities including CRUD, login, logout, reset password.
Conducted source code reviews, and maintained Git pipelines and repositories to GitHub.
